books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Characters’ lives begin to fall apart as a mysterious stranger discloses secrets to them; a stand-alone thriller.
books.name: THE STRANGER

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The lives of two couples converge unexpectedly.
books.name: THE LONGEST RIDE

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: Investigating the disappearance of a billionaire’s son, Detective Zach Jordan and his partner (and ex-girlfriend) find themselves in the midst of a conspiracy.
books.name: NYPD RED 3

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one struggling to survive in the countryside, the other joining the Resistance in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Anne Tyler
books.description: Four generations of a family are drawn to a house in the Baltimore suburbs.
books.name: A SPOOL OF BLUE THREAD

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not yet meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Julia Kent
books.description: A mystery shopper meets a moneyed man; a five-volume collection of the romantic series
books.name: SHOPPING FOR A BILLIONAIRE

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: John Puller, a special agent with the Army, hunts for his brother, who was convicted of treason and has escaped from prison.
books.name: THE ESCAPE

books.author: by Gregg Olsen
books.description: An investigator receives a message from her mother, seemingly from beyond the grave.
books.name: A WICKED SNOW

books.author: by Lisa Genova
books.description: A 50-year-old Harvard professor learns she has early-onset Alzheimer's disease; now a movie.
books.name: STILL ALICE

books.author: by Randy Wayne White
books.description: Danger abounds as Doc Ford investigates the disappearance of a cache of letters obtained by a friend who sells collectibles — letters written to a previously unknown girlfriend by Fidel Castro.
books.name: CUBA STRAITS

books.author: by Katy Evans
books.description: Rachel is swept up in a world of wealth and power when she meets a Chicago playboy.
books.name: MANWHORE
